info.title: VIAcode ITSM connector for Azure API
info.description: VIAcode’s ITSM Connector provides a simple, streamlined integration between common ITSM (ticketing) systems and Microsoft’s Azure resources and tools ensuring improved visibility and productivity relating to Azure cloud operations and management.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The parameters required call Process Existing Signals.

securityCenterAlerts.description: Security Center Alerts for VIAcode’s ITSM Connector

azureAdvisorRecommendations.description: Azure Advisor Recommendations for VIAcode’s ITSM Connector

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.
